p: The combination of Solanum mauritianum and Melia azedarach ethyl acetate extracts appeared to be antagonistic as the antifungal activity observed against F. oxysporum was much less when compared to the individual application of S. mauritianum and M. azedarach ( Figure 5). The same plant extract combination exhibited a synergistic antifungal activity against F. proliferatum ( Figure 1). The antifungal activity exhibited by M. azedarach was equivalent to what was recorded for the positive control ( Figure 5). The combination of Lantana camara and Combretum molle ethyl acetate extract did not improve the antifungal activity against F. semitectum when compared to individual application of C. molle ethyl acetate, which showed a very strong antifungal activity ( Figure 6).
